body:
Hey, I wanted to create a thread like this.

What Position Are You?

Defender:
Your job is to stop the opponents getting to your monument, you do this by setting up great defence to stop Rushers.

Supplier:
Your job is to craft as much iron armour as possible. You will put this in a chest for your team.

Midfielder:
Your job is to stop opponents making it past spawn. You don't often enter the opponents spawn, but you sometimes do.

Attacker/Rusher:
Your job is to just get to the enemy's monument as fast as you can, sneaking round the Midfielders. Once at the monument, you have to kill the defenders and destroy the monument.

Spectator:
Your job is to fly around and watch the action.

My position is a Midfielder.
Post your down below!
body_tagged:

Midfielder:
Your job is to stop opponents making it past spawn. You don't often enter the opponents spawn, but you sometimes do.

Attacker/Rusher:
Your job is to just get to the enemy's monument as fast as you can, sneaking round the Midfielders. Once at the monument, you have to kill the defenders and destroy the monument.

Spectator:
Your job is to fly around and watch the action.

My position is a Midfielder.
Post your down below!

replies.body:
Step 1: take armor off

Step 2: Learn to ninja bridge

Step 3: learn to MLG block place

Step 4: learn to ignore KD

Step 5: Put extremely high volume Dubstep on and YOLO to the other teams base.

5 eZ steps that will (Probably) work. xD
replies.body_tagged:
Step 1: take armor off

Step 2: Learn to ninja bridge

Step 3: learn to MLG block place

Step 4: learn to ignore KD

Step 5: Put extremely high volume Dubstep on and YOLO to the other teams base.

5 eZ steps that will (Probably) work. xD

replies.body: Is ninja bridging no shift building or shit unshift building? I think shift unshift is shroom building .-. I suck at ninja bridging then ;-;
replies.body_tagged: Is ninja bridging no shift building or shit unshift building? I think shift unshift is shroom building .-. I suck at ninja bridging then ;-;

replies.body:
Its easy.

Just begin with Normal place, normal place, then shift-unshift. Do that pver and over and you will get used to it. Thats what I did ;)
replies.body_tagged:
Its easy.

Just begin with Normal place, normal place, then shift-unshift. Do that pver and over and you will get used to it. Thats what I did ;)

reply_to.body: Is ninja bridging no shift building or shit unshift building? I think shift unshift is shroom building .-. I suck at ninja bridging then ;-;
reply_to.body_tagged: Is ninja bridging no shift building or shit unshift building? I think shift unshift is shroom building .-. I suck at ninja bridging then ;-;

replies.body: So no shifting for first two blocks? Then shift unshift for next block, then repeat?
replies.body_tagged: So no shifting for first two blocks? Then shift unshift for next block, then repeat?

replies.body: Exactly, just get used to it. If you fail a lot, its normal, it happened to me too. Nothing is easy with shift-unshift, but its easy once you learn.

replies.body:
Depends on my situation actually. I dabble in 3/4 fields except for supplier. 

If i see an opening in their defense: (Covered monument) ill take advantage of that and rush and mine.

If i see that the mid field needs support ill reinforce the midfield.

If i wish to, ill make an OP and tactical defense.
